s1.name: Support
s1.subtitle: JORAM support, provided by ScalAgent Distributed Technologies
s1.p: ScalAgent DT provides professional support for JORAM. Check the brochure.
s1.subtitle: JORAM/JOnAS support, provided by Bull
s1.p: Bull provides professional Support Service for JOnAS, including specific issues related to using and defining an appropriate JORAM configuration within JOnAS. Several coverage options are available, including a full 24X7 coverage. This is an enterprise class support service that can be provided thanks to the involvment of key developers of JOnAS and JORAM ObjectWeb teams. A detailed description is provided here (pdf file). Fore more information please send a mail to srv.services at bull.net.
